name: Mes Comptines
description:
Frolic full-featured music videos keep children entertained while enjoying the simple - yet addictive game play and alternately singing along these well-known kid tunes.
Features
17 famous nursery rhymes with 3D-animated music videos!
All songs are uniquely composed and sung by professional singer
Easily to sing along with the karaoke-style lyrics
Enhancing hand-and-ear coordination of your little ones through simple game play
Cute and child-friendly artwork
Kids Favorite Nursery Rhymes
L’alphabet
Ah les crocodiles 
Fee-Fye le crapaud 
Le fermier dans son pré 
Savez-vous planter les choux ?
Am stram gram
L’araignée Gypsy
Pomme de Reinette
Frère Jacques
Promenons-nous dans les bois
Le vieux Mac Donald
Sur le pont d’Avignon
Elle descend de la montagne
J’aime la galette
Une souris verte
1, 2, 3 nous irons au bois
Meunier, tu dors
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
